title: Act 2024 (An tÚdarás Póilíneachta agus Sábháilteachta Pobail) (Establishment
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety 
Act 2024 (An tÚdarás Póilíneachta agus Sábháilteachta Pobail) (Establishment 
Day) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited policing security community safety act 2024 (an tudaras poilineachta agus sabhailteachta pobail) (establishment day) order 2025

title: Act 2024 (An tÚdarás Póilíneachta agus Sábháilteachta Pobail) (Establishment
heading: 2. The 2nd day of April 2025 is appointed to be the establishment day of
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of April 2025 is appointed to be the establishment day of 
An tÚdarás Póilíneachta agus Sábháilteachta Pobail for the purposes of the 
Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 April, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [108] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
